descriptionlist.description: Add custom widgets right on your homescreen. This includes widgets such as time/date and apple's today widgets.

Sadly, the today widgets don't function exactly as I wanted them so there might be a few bugs here and there. Due to which features have been disabled, they still exist in code so they can be enabled via either directly modifying the /var/mobile/Library/Preferences/com.dgh0st.hswidget.widgetlayouts.plist or creating another tweak. More information about plist values available at "layout configuration" link below.
If you want to create your own custom widgets take a look "how to create your own widgets" link below.
